title: Australia's Orion wins OK to develop $263 mln S.Africa zinc-copper project

Australia's Orion wins OK to develop $263 mln S.Africa zinc-copper project

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Sep 05, 2019 08:50)

© Reuters. Australia's Orion wins OK to develop $263 mln S.Africa zinc-copper project JOHANNESBURG, Sept 5 (Reuters) - South Africa's mines ministry on Thursday said Australia's Orion Minerals could go ahead with development of a 4 billion rand ($263 million) copper-zinc project in Northern Cape province. "This latest investment confirms that South Africa remains a preferred investment destination for mining," the Department of Mineral Resources and Energy said in a statement. This week Orion, which operates in gold, , nickel and platinum, said the mining rights were valid for an initial 24 years and could be renewed on application. = 15.2369 rand)
